title: beautiful | type ID please
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021953im_/http:/typophile.com/files/beautiful_3654.gif)

Dave
author: kiosk

comments.content:
Thanks

It’s very close, but the capital I is slightly different...

Hi Dave,

it’s [Lineto Typ 1451](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021953/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Typ1451/).  
More alternatives in [this list](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021953/http:/typophile.com/node/46247).  
F
